thread.title: Love Is in the Air with Valentine’s Day-Inspired Gifts from Disney Parks
thread.title_full: Love Is in the Air with Valentine’s Day-Inspired Gifts from Disney Parks

author: Steven Miller
title: Love Is in the Air with Valentine’s Day-Inspired Gifts from Disney Parks

organizations.name: shiny silver and shiny rose gold finish

text:
With Valentine’s Day less than a month away, I’ve gathered several of my favorite products from Disney Parks for couples wanting to celebrate their love. Many of items may be found in select merchandise locations at Disneyland and Walt Disney World Resorts ; via the Shop Disney Parks app ; or on the Disney Parks online store .

We recently introduced heart-shaped charms by PANDORA Jewelry . Crafted in sterling silver with cubic zirconia detailing, the charms features Mickey and Minnie icons on either side of the heart charms .

This year, guests will find a limited edition Valentine’s Day pin featuring Shorty from Disney’s “ Tangled .” Releasing on January 26, the pin has an edition size of 5,000.
Look for other open edition pins inspired by Disney-Pixar ’s “ Up ” and the short film, “ Lava .”

Couples celebrating the upcoming holiday together will find several companion tees. Look for the popular “I’ll Be Your Mickey” and “I’ll Be Your Minnie” designs along with shirts inspired by Mr. and Mrs. Incredible from Disney-Pixar’s “ The Incredibles .”

Speaking of couples, guests will find items featuring long-time sweethearts Mickey and Minnie Mouse Items include a handbag from the Disney Boutique collection, novelty socks, and a collectible figurine. 
They will also be found on a new Valentine’s Day set from ALEX AND ANI . The set contains two bracelets – one featuring Mickey and Minnie Mouse kissing in a Shiny Silver and Shiny Rose Gold Finish combination, and the other with a Swarovski Crystal Mickey-shaped charm in a Shiny Rose Gold Finish. 

Finally, look for other love-themed coffee mugs or D-Tech on Demand phone cases.
For guests at Walt Disney World Resort, we released a limited edition retail MagicBand 2.0 with an iconic scene from Walt Disney’s “ Lady and Tramp .” The MagicBand has an edition size of 2,500.
Happy Valentine’s Day!
